newsitem.title: USA: CME July hogs rally to new high as buy stops hit.
newsitem.headline: CME July hogs rally to new high as buy stops hit.

text.p: Persistent short-covering and fund rolling touched off a large buy stop order in July CME hog futures and that month shot up to a new contract high before meeting resistance, traders said.

July ran up to post a gain of 1.100 cents per lb and a new high of 86.500 cents before slipping to trade 0.55 higher at 85.950 cents. June ran up for a gain of 0.650 before retreating to trade 0.225 higher at 84.600 cents.
Fund rolling and lack of selling interest early lifted futures much of the trading session, they said.
